addon_description.message: A Zotero plugin for tracking research history and enhanced note navigation

access_history.description: Title for the access history panel

item_preview.description: Title for the item preview panel

open_item.description: Button text to open an item

view_details.description: Button text to view item details

no_history.description: Empty state message when no history exists

no_matches.description: Empty state message when search returns no results

type_label.description: Label for item type in preview

access_count_label.description: Label for access count in preview

last_accessed_label.description: Label for last accessed time in preview

days_ago.description: Time group label for multiple days ago

clear_history.description: Menu item to clear all history

clear_history_confirm.message: Are you sure you want to clear all Research Navigator data?
